# Coherent Rage (Trait)
## Overview
**Coherent Rage (Ulfen Guard):** Your determination allows you to hold onto a shred of your rational mind at all times. Select one of the following skills: [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]], [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]], [[Handle Animal (Skill)|Handle Animal]], or [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]]. You may use this skill normally while raging.

**Source:** Faction Guide, pg. 62
